description: Main route component for a Qwik-based personal notes manager app, handling state management, fetching and updating notes, and rendering subcomponents.

methods.name: refetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches updated list of notes from API and updates the store, optionally selecting a specific note.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Handles selecting a note by its ID, resetting editing state.

methods.name: handleCreate
methods.description: Prepares the UI to create a new note by resetting selection and enabling edit mode.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves a new or updated note via API and refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID via API and updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Enables editing mode for the currently selected note.

methods.name: handleCancel
methods.description: Cancels editing and resets related state.
